channel.title: philstar.com - RSS Headlines
channel.description: Philippine News for the Filipino Global Community

item.title: Go seeks to strengthen Philippine healthcare system
item.author: Cecille Suerte Felipe
item.description: Sen. Bong Go is pushing for the passage of legislative measures aimed to strengthen the country’s healthcare system, help Filipinos get through the pandemic and lead the country toward recovery.

item.title: US sanctions ICC chief prosecutor Bensouda
item.author: Pia Lee-Brago
item.description: The United States imposed sanctions against International Criminal Court Chief Prosecutor Fatou Bensouda and another senior official of The Hague-based court for prosecuting US military and intelligence personnel in Afghanistan.

item.title: UN rights chief hits ‘politicization’ of COVID-19
item.author: Pia Lee-Brago
item.description: The United Nations human rights chief expressed serious concern over the “increasing politicization” of the COVID-19 pandemic and efforts to blame its effects on political opponents and smear campaigns against journalists.

item.title: AMLC, DOF renew ties, step up campaign vs terrorism
item.author: Lawrence Agcaoili
item.description: The Anti-Money Laundering Council has renewed its partnership with the Department of Finance to step up the government’s campaign against money laundering and terrorism financing.

item.title: 700,000 OFWs to lose job over COVID-19
item.author: Czeriza Valencia
item.description: As many as 700,000 overseas Filipino workers may lose their jobs as a result of the pandemic-induced global recession, the Department of Labor and Employment said yesterday.

item.title: Sotto advises Duque: Get a good lawyer
item.author: Cecille Suerte Felipe
item.description: Senate President Vicente Sotto III has advised Health Secretary Francisco Duque III to get a good lawyer and stop saying that he knew nothing about the mess in the Philippine Health Insurance Corp.

item.title: UP, DLSU retain spots in world rankings
item.author: Janvic Mateo
item.description: The University of the Philippines and De La Salle University have retained their respective spots in the latest world university rankings released by London-based Times Higher Education.

item.title: MTRCB wants to regulate Netflix
item.author: Cecille Suerte Felipe
item.description: The Movie and Television Review and Classification Board wants to regulate the content of Netflix and other online streaming services to ensure their compliance with Philippine laws.

item.title: Duterte calls for ‘new order’ amid pandemic
item.author: Alexis Romero
item.description: President Duterte has urged fellow leaders to seize the opportunity presented by the coronavirus disease pandemic to build a “new order” that is more secure and sustainable by strengthening economic and defense cooperation.

item.title: Laguna VCO clinical trials show promising results
item.author: Rainier Allan Ronda
item.description: The clinical trials being conducted by the Department of Science and Technology-Food and Nutrition Research Institute on virgin coconut oil or VCO as a food supplement to help in the treatment of coronavirus cases in Santa Rosa, Laguna are showing promising results.
